home_meta_title: Smart Nanny - Reliable professional nanny selection for your family
home_meta_description: With us are the people you can truly trust with what matters most – your child.
home_hero_title: Reliable professional nanny selection for your family
home_hero_subtitle: With us are the people you can truly trust with what matters most – your child.
why_title: Why do parents choose Smart Nanny service?
nanny-selection-why-title: Why do nannies choose Smart Nanny service?
why_desc_selection: We build cooperation on trust, clear agreements and mutual respect. We provide a transparent process, fair conditions and always stay in touch so that you feel supported..

why_short.title: Professionalism
why_short.desc: Our nannies constantly improve their skills through first aid, development, and childcare training

why_short.title: Fast selection
why_short.desc: We have a large team of verified nannies, so we offer options within 1–5 days, guaranteeing timely support for families

why_short.title: Verified nannies
why_short.desc: Each candidate undergoes document, experience, and reference checks, as well as an interview for your peace of mind and safety

why_short.title: Family support
why_short.desc: We help establish comfortable and long-term cooperation so you feel confident every day

why_long.title: Verified families
why_long.desc: We select only reliable clients with clear conditions, adequate expectations, and a safe home environment

why_long.title: Professional development
why_long.desc: We provide access to educational materials and methods. We help you grow in your profession, no matter where you start

why_long.title: Flexible format
why_long.desc: Find the optimal schedule for yourself: full-time, part-time, one-time help, or live-in work

why_long.title: Fair conditions and pay
why_long.desc: We do not take on vacancies with a low rate. Every hour of yours is paid fairly and according to agreements

why_long.title: Constant support
why_long.desc: We do not have a 'fit in yourself' rule. You can always ask for help, advice, or support

why_long.title: Respect for nannies
why_long.desc: We work only with families who value your work, keep agreements, and treat you with care

services_cards.title: PERMANENT NANNY
services_cards.description: A service for families who need stable help. We carefully select a nanny, taking into account your wishes, needs, and family values for long-term cooperation.

services_cards.title: HOURLY NANNY
services_cards.description: A service for families who need situational help for a few hours or a short period (a few days or weeks). We will find a qualified nanny in just 1-2 days, and in some cases — even on the same day.

services_cards.title: NANNY TRAINING
services_cards.description: An online course for nannies who want to work confidently and understand children's needs. The program covers neuropedagogy, basics of pediatrics, child psychology, and career development. Upon completion — a certificate of successful completion of the courseAfter completion — a certificate of successful completion of the course.

services_accordion.title: Nanny-Educator
services_accordion.description: Support with preparing for school or kindergarten. Nannies with a background in education conduct activities that help children adapt, develop speech, logic, and social skills.

services_accordion.title: Night Nanny
services_accordion.description: A service for families with infants or those who need support at night. The nanny comes overnight and takes care of the child — so you can rest peacefully or recover after childbirth.

services_accordion.title: Event Nanny
services_accordion.description: We’re ready for any occasion — from family and kids’ events to important conferences and celebrations. Our nannies will provide engaging activities, games, and complete safety so you can enjoy the event worry-free.

services_accordion.title: Weekend Nanny
services_accordion.description: A solution for parents who want to have some free time on Saturday or Sunday — for rest, errands, or just recharging.

road_subtitle: Professionalism doesn't happen by chance — we build it step by step

road_steps.title: Thorough candidate selection
road_steps.description: At this stage, candidates are selected during an interview with HR, where we assess their motivation, willingness to work with children, and compliance with family values.

road_steps.title: Knowledge assessment
road_steps.description: Candidates take a test on childcare, safety, and child development. This confirms that they not only love children but also have the necessary knowledge.
needed: Understanding the basics of child safety and care
Knowledge about the stages of child development

road_steps.title: Training and preparation
road_steps.description: Candidates undergo first aid training and a professional 'Professional Nanny' course, where they gain practical knowledge for working with children.

road_steps.title: Final selection
road_steps.description: We support the nanny at all stages of work: we consult, help with questions, and invite them to a community of like-minded people, where you can always find support and inspiration.
needed: Support and involvement in the internal community

gallery_subtitle: Get to know our nannies through genuine photos from real life. You will see people who care for children every day with love, care, and professionalism.
vacation_desc: Choose verified offers from families working with the Smart Nanny agency.
blog_subtitle: We find nannies you can trust with your most precious – your child.
review_desc: Stories of families who have already found their perfect nanny through Smart Nanny
education_hero_subtitle: A practical online course that helps you confidently interact with both children and parents, and build a successful career as a professional nanny.

course_cards.title: Dream of becoming a nanny
course_cards.description: You will get a complete base of knowledge, skills, and confidence to start your career

course_cards.title: Want to reach a new level
course_cards.description: You will deepen your knowledge and gain more confidence at work

course_cards.title: Have a foundation – need to structure it
course_cards.description: You will systematize your knowledge and get new tools for work

course_cards.title: Strive for new methods
course_cards.description: You will update your approaches and add more interesting activities

get_title: What you will get after the course
get_points: Free employment from the Smart Nanny service
Practical knowledge of childcare and child development
Understanding of professional ethics and effective work in a family
Skills in pediatrics, psychology, pedagogy, and communication
Ready-made instructions for working with children of different ages
Tips for employment and career development
get_subtitle_1: And this is just the beginning!
get_subtitle_2: We open up new opportunities and horizons.
program_subtitle: This course is designed so that you not only listen to lectures, but also get a clear system of knowledge and practical skills. Each module is a logical step towards confidence, professionalism, and readiness to work with children of any age.

education_stats.description: Our nannies get a job after the first interview
Graduates increased their pay level after training

education_desc1: Our course is a modern approach to child development and care. You will gain truly important knowledge: basics of pediatrics, child psychology, early development methods, games and activities to stimulate growth.
education_desc2: You will also learn to work harmoniously in a family and develop your professional skills. The course is designed for those who want to grow through practice and understanding of the child.

offer_sections.question: General Provisions
offer_sections.answer: This agreement governs the relationship between the customer and the contractor regarding the provision of the services specified below.

offer_sections.question: Subject of the Agreement
offer_sections.answer: The subject of the agreement is the provision of services by the contractor in accordance with the customer's technical assignment.

offer_sections.question: Procedure for Service Provision
offer_sections.answer: Services are provided in stages, according to the agreed work schedule and deadlines.

offer_sections.question: Rights and Obligations of the Parties
offer_sections.answer: The customer undertakes to provide all necessary information, the contractor — to perform the work qualitatively and on time.

offer_sections.question: Cost and Payment Procedure
offer_sections.answer: The cost of services is agreed by the parties and paid in stages or after completion of the work, according to the issued invoice.

offer_sections.question: Warranty and Refunds
offer_sections.answer: The contractor provides a 30-day warranty for the completed work. In case of deficiencies, corrections or refunds are made.

offer_sections.question: Confidentiality and Data Protection
offer_sections.answer: The parties undertake not to disclose confidential information obtained during cooperation to third parties.

offer_sections.question: Liability of the Parties
offer_sections.answer: The parties are liable in accordance with applicable law and the terms of this agreement.

offer_sections.question: Dispute Resolution Procedure
offer_sections.answer: All disputes are resolved through negotiations, and if no agreement is reached — in court.

offer_sections.question: Term of the Agreement
offer_sections.answer: The agreement enters into force upon signing and remains in effect until all obligations are fulfilled by the parties.

policy_desc: We value your trust and understand how important it is to ensure the confidentiality and security of your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains what data we collect, how we process, store, share it, and what rights you have as a user.

policy_sections.question: Who we are
policy_sections.answer: We are a company providing digital services. Our contact details are listed below.

policy_sections.question: What personal data we collect
policy_sections.answer: We may collect your name, email, phone number, IP address, and other technical data.

policy_sections.question: How we use your data
policy_sections.answer: Your data is used to provide services, communicate, and improve our service.

policy_sections.question: Legal grounds for data processing
policy_sections.answer: We process data based on your consent, contract performance, or legitimate interests.

policy_sections.question: Data retention periods
policy_sections.answer: Data is stored for as long as necessary to achieve the purpose of processing or as required by law.

policy_sections.question: How we protect your data
policy_sections.answer: We use technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access.

policy_sections.question: Your rights
policy_sections.answer: You have the right to access, modify, delete your data, and other rights under the law.

policy_sections.question: Changes to the Policy
policy_sections.answer: We may update this Policy from time to time. All changes will be published on this page.

policy_sections.question: Contacts
policy_sections.answer: For all privacy questions, you can contact us by email or phone listed on the website.
